title: LEIF Service 2 inputs
description: This document records the inputs of the LEIF Service 2 system

Project Number.description: Unique identifier for each test (structrure: PME2-xxx)

Granted support.description: Granted support after installation of solar panels

Electricity consumption of the grid.description: Electricity consumption from the grid before the project

Primary energy consumption before.description: Primary energy consumption before the installation of the solar panel system during the project.

Current inverter set power.description: Current inverter set power - inverter power that was already installed before the project.

Inverter power in project.description: Inverter set power in project - in addition to the existing inverter.

Region.description: The planning region where the house is located. There are five planning regions in Latvia - Kurzeme, Latgale, Riga, Vidzeme and Zemgale planning region.
